name: Teleport.Video
description: Teleport.Video is an online video conferencing platform that enables you to connect with people or a group from anywhere. Bring your business meetings to your phone easily. View presentations shared on a call even when you are on the go because we believe work is what you do and not where you do it. A perfect blend of minimal bandwidth requirement and great video quality make Teleport.Video the perfect online platform to start your interaction. Dont settle for instant messaging when you can teleport yourself anywhere, anytime.  Key features of Teleport.Video :  - Unlimited number of calls from the app  - Exclusive video meeting room  - View profile of participants on an active call - Notify participants when a video chat is being recorded - Room for unlimited participants in a conference video call
